original_text: A voice was heard upon the high places, weeping and supplications of the children of Israel: for they have perverted their way, and they have forgotten the Lord their God.
korean_text: 소리가 헐벗은 산 위에서 들리니 곧 이스라엘 자손이 애곡하며 간구하는 것이라 그들이 그들의 길을 굽게 하며 자기 하나님 여호와를 잊어버렸음이로다

sentences.original_text: A voice was heard upon the high places
weeping and supplications of the children of Israel
for they have perverted their way
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 자기 길을 그릇되게 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: and they have forgotten the Lord their God
